    IExagonExternalServer
    Exagon.registerExternalServer(ExagonProtocolEnum protocol, StackConfiguration config, IExagonProtocolMapperOutbound protocolMapper)
     
    IExagonExternalServer
    IExagon.registerExternalServer(ExagonProtocolEnum protocol, StackConfiguration config, IExagonProtocolMapperOutbound protocolMapper)
    Registers an outbound network connection while creating an external server based on the specified protocol, stack configuration, and protocol mapper, to send outgoing requests (and also receive a reply from them).
